amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part A of House Report 115-783 to bar the use of funds in contravention of existing federal requirements for meaningful consultation and engagement with tribal communities related to activities that will impact them.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Visclosky.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
